Message:
This place that
you’ve created is
the very thing I once
tried to build.

A country where witches
can live as witches...

Heh, to think my most
cherished dream could
be accomplished with
the greatest of ease...

Hehe... The meaning behind
their words are finally
becoming clear to me.

Duke. I’m sure you can save
every witch out there...

Even me, and my heart
that has since lost its way.

So, I ask that you
continue showing me
those miracles of yours.

As long as you allow me to,
I, the great Gil’uial,
will stay by your side.
